snippet: Hyundai’s compact sedan earned the honor over the Ford Focus and Volkswagen Passat, while the Evoque beat out the Honda CR-V and BMW X3.
abstract: Hyundai’s compact sedan earned the honor over the Ford Focus and Volkswagen Passat, while the Evoque beat out the Honda CR-V and BMW X3.

headline.main: Hyundai Elantra Is Car of the Year; Range Rover Evoque Is Truck of the Year
